item.title: Blue Green Deployment with Nginx for Elixir/Phoenix Release
item.description: In this post today, I’ll share about how I setup blue green deployment for my Phoenix application using nginx running on a single machine. This post is made possible thanks to this article about Custom Blue Green Deployment with Nginx And Gitlab CI. The core idea to make blue green deployment possible for Elixir releases with nginx is through:
